Member Function Documentation

std::unique_ptr< State > StateFactory::CreateStateInstance ( Command  cmd,
ros::NodeHandle  node,
RefuseBin  bin 
)
static

Creates a new state instance based on the cmd param. The node handle and the refuse bin are used in specific cases.

Parameters
cmdthe most recently issued command
noderos node handle to the state machine node
binlocation information about the refuse bin, expressed in x,y and yaw coordinates.
